verbs.description: as [ARG0: dodgers] [V: win] [ARG1: big] [ARGM-MNR: with extreme platooning a theme emerges] the l a dodgers use a new lineup nearly every game it yields results and compels players to ignore their pedigrees and embrace the collective good dodgers nlcs dave roberts manny machado atlanta braves dave roberts pitcher gio gonzalez enrique hernandez quique hernández milwaukee miller park colorado david freese wade miley nl los angeles dodgers waldo national league justin turner milwaukee brewers yasiel puig los angeles andrew friedman chris taylor max muncy
